Package org.jtool.cfg

Class CFGNode

java.lang.Object
org.jtool.graph.GraphElement
org.jtool.graph.GraphNode
org.jtool.cfg.CFGNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
CFGEntry, CFGExit, CFGMerge, CFGStatement
public class CFGNode
extends GraphNode
A node of a CFG.
